p: These findings are broadly similar to the few published reports of comparable approaches to treatment. The VISTA trial (Delforge et al, 2012) reported that QoL was comparable between the two arms (bortezomib and MP (VMP) versus MP) after approximately 1 year in a population similar to the non‐intensive pathway. The finding that thalidomide maintenance therapy has little impact on QoL is consistent with an earlier study (Verelst et al, 2011) and the combination of lenalidomide and low‐dose dexamethasone (RD) versus MPT has been reported to improve OS without having a negative effect to QoL (Delforge et al, 2015).
